content:
Pentikkosthinnantyatthil-naavukall shishyarkkaayetthi
Svargatthilninnaagathanil-shleehanmaaraahlaadichu.
Nirmmalashishyanmaarkkaayi-ttaashvaasadane vitta suthaa!
Nin kshemam nyangallkkeki-thoshippikkuka nin varavil
Ee divasam saudhe thrithvam-vellivaayi shleehanmaare
Jnyaanatthaal poshippichu-naavukalle daanam cheythu.
Pantrandappostholanmaar-roohaathannaasheervvaadaal
Sthuthyamathaam thrithvatthe poy-lokasamaksham ghoshichu
